start.text: Let's go easy, now~ Best not to complicate things too much.
Well, things are looking smooth so far.
Tremble in the eternal pits of fear. ...Khh, felt like throwing a cool one-liner.
Let's start out slowly, no point getting nervous.

start_boss.text: Alright, alright. Stay calm, and cooool your head.
Boy, they have no right to make me this nervous.

out_of_missiles.text: Outta missiles. Don't panic, you guys.
That's all of our missiles. Better not get impatient.

engaged.text: We'd better not get impatient and get things done for certain.
Well, this'll be simple. No problem at all for me!

need_help.text: Uh-oh. I could use some help.

pursuing.text: Whew, that guy almost turned the tide and got me there.
Sector life makes you numb to this kind of stuff.

running.text: That's a bit too much for me.

hull_90.text: Don't panic, you guys. We gotta get used to this.

hull_50.text: That's that, and this is this.

hull_30.text: Welp, can't expect others to look after your own life...

overload.text: It can't be helped. That's that, and this is this.

death.text: It'd be too sucky to die without doing much at all...

victory.text: If only our great commander could recognize all my hard work~ ...They didn't hear that, did they?
Looks like our jobs are done now, so let's get back and cop some rest.
That's that, and this is this.
